conbody.p: The English Department at Virginia Tech rents out large classrooms for a fixed price in order to generate revenue for its various endeavors. Each classroom can be utilized for a number of reasons and is available to any and all responsible individuals on a first come, first served basis. This website is intended to provide you as a potential renter with information about the rooms in question and offer instruction for making the most of your experience at Virginia Tech, whether you are visiting or a student of the university.
